languages.text: Вызывающий вид поврежденного осколка не оставляет сомнений — это часть омерзительной ксеносской технологии.

traits.locale_text: Вызывающий вид поврежденного осколка не оставляет сомнений — это часть омерзительной ксеносской технологии.

languages.text: The very sight of this damaged shard appals you and leaves no doubt in your mind: this is a piece of abominable xenotech.
languages.original_text: Вызывающий вид поврежденного осколка не оставляет сомнений — это часть омерзительной ксеносской технологии.

traits.locale_text: The mere appearance of this damaged shard appals you and leaves no doubt in your mind: this is a piece of abominable xenotech.
The mere appearance of this damaged shard appals you and leaves no doubt in your mind: this is a piece of abominable xenotech.
The very sight of this damaged shard appals you and leaves no doubt in your mind: this is a piece of abominable xenotech.
The very sight of this damaged shard appals you and leaves no doubt in your mind: this is a piece of abominable xenotech.
The very sight of this damaged shard appals you and leaves no doubt in your mind: this is a piece of abominable xenotech.

languages.text: この損傷した破片を見ただけで、愕然とさせられた。これがあの忌まわしい異星技術の一部であることを疑う余地もない。
languages.original_text: The very sight of this damaged shard appals you and leaves no doubt in your mind: this is a piece of abominable xenotech.

traits.locale_text: この損傷した破片を見ただけで、愕然とさせられた。これがあの忌まわしい異星技術の一部であることを疑う余地もない。

languages.text: La simple vue de ce fragment abîmé vous horrifie et ne laisse aucun doute dans votre esprit : il est issu d'une abominable xénotechnologie.
languages.original_text: The very sight of this damaged shard appals you and leaves no doubt in your mind: this is a piece of abominable xenotech.

traits.locale_text: La simple vue de ce fragment abîmé vous horrifie et ne laisse aucun doute dans votre esprit : il est issu d'une abominable xénotechnologie.

languages.text: 这块缺损的碎片给人一种不祥的感觉。毫无疑问，它是异形科技的邪恶产物。
languages.original_text: The very sight of this damaged shard appals you and leaves no doubt in your mind: this is a piece of abominable xenotech.

traits.locale_text: 这块缺损的碎片给人一种不祥的感觉。毫无疑问，它是异形科技的邪恶产物。

languages.text: Con solo mirar este fragmento dañado, te invade el pavor y no te queda duda alguna: se trata de una muestra abominable de xenotecnología.
languages.original_text: The very sight of this damaged shard appals you and leaves no doubt in your mind: this is a piece of abominable xenotech.

traits.locale_text: Con solo mirar este fragmento dañado, te invade el pavor y no te queda duda alguna: se trata de una muestra abominable de xenotecnología.

languages.text: Allein der Anblick dieses beschädigten Splitters entsetzt dich. Du bist dir vollkommen sicher: Hierbei handelt es sich um schändliche Xenotech.
languages.original_text: The very sight of this damaged shard appals you and leaves no doubt in your mind: this is a piece of abominable xenotech.

traits.locale_text: Allein der Anblick dieses beschädigten Splitters entsetzt dich. Du bist dir vollkommen sicher: Hierbei handelt es sich um schändliche Xenotech.

languages.text: Bu hasarlı parçanın görüntüsü dahi seni rahatsız ediyor. Zerre şüphe duymadan biliyorsun ki bu, mekruh bir zeno teknoloji ürünü.
languages.original_text: The very sight of this damaged shard appals you and leaves no doubt in your mind: this is a piece of abominable xenotech.

traits.locale_text: Bu hasarlı parçanın görüntüsü dahi seni rahatsız ediyor. Zerre şüphe duymadan biliyorsun ki bu, mekruh bir zeno teknoloji parçası.
